description: Also called "Fen xiang jing ji". "Ping tai jing ji" is "Platform Economy".

examples.chinese: 终于有电瓶车了,不用做共享经济了
examples.translation: Finally got an e-bike, no need for sharing economy anymore

examples.chinese: 现在共享经济越来越发达
examples.translation: Sharing economy is becoming more developed now

examples.chinese: 零工经济是Airbnb,滴滴等共享经济的一种重要组成形式
examples.translation: Gig economy is an important form of sharing economy like Airbnb, Didi
